chart.title: Death rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
chart.subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths attributed to household and ambient air pollution per 100,000 people.
chart.note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
